text: Ani jaba uniharuko pasama hamikahambata satya a'ipugyo ta uniharu bhanna thaleh ki juna kuro musala'i prapta bha'eko thiyo, tyasto kina prapta bha'ena? Ta ke juna aghi musala'i di'i'eko thiyo, uniharule tyasama kuphra garenan? Spasta bhaneka thi'e ki yi duvai jadugara hun juna eka arkako sahayata gardachan ra hami ta yinila'i inkara gardachaum
